00005 // Name: RegisterForRendering()
00006 // Desc: Add the given function/class to the ones beeing called during rendering stage
00007 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00008 void OutputWindow::RegisterForRendering(RENDERFUNC func, RenderType rendertype)
00009 {
00010         switch(rendertype)
00011         {
00012         case RT_BACKGROUND:
00013                 renderbgfunclist.push_back(func);
00014         case RT_DEFAULT:
00015                 renderfunclist.push_back(func);
00016         case RT_FAST:
00017                 renderfastfunclist.push_back(func);
00018         case RT_FOREGROUND:
00019                 renderfgfunclist.push_back(func);
00020         }
00021 }

00023 {
00024         switch(rendertype)
00025         {
00026         case RT_BACKGROUND:
00027                 renderbgclslist.push_back(cls);
00028         case RT_DEFAULT:
00029                 renderclslist.push_back(cls);
00030         case RT_FAST:
00031                 renderfastclslist.push_back(cls);
00032         case RT_FOREGROUND:
00033                 renderfgclslist.push_back(cls);
00034         }
00035 }

00039 // Desc: Remove the given function/class from the ones beeing called during rendering stage

00041 void OutputWindow::DeregisterFromRendering(RENDERFUNC func, RenderType rendertype)
00042 {
00043         switch(rendertype)
00044         {
00045         case RT_BACKGROUND:

00049         case RT_FAST:

00051         case RT_FOREGROUND:
00052                 renderfgfunclist.remove(func);
00053         }
00054 }
